definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Eugenic Section Doctor think it is false positive, the impact on the probability of a small BB.
sentences.chinese: 优生科的医生认为是假阳性，对BB的影响概率很小。
优生学具有生物学上的意义。

sentences.english: Politician take no interest in eugenics because the unborn have not vote.
sentences.chinese: 政治家对优生学不感兴趣，因为未出生者并无选举权。

sentences.english: The chance for scholarships is much better for straight-A students.
sentences.chinese: 全优生更有可能得到奖学金。

sentences.english: Nobody should doubt the eugenic agenda remains alive and well in America.
sentences.chinese: 任何人都不应怀疑优生议程仍然存在于美国。

sentences.english: So the gifted students need guidance and optimization in partnership communication.
sentences.chinese: 为此，资优生更需要同伴交往引导，优化同伴关系。

sentences.english: At last a test of agriculture application on planning of Fushi apple is set up.
sentences.chinese: 最后以富士苹果优生区的选择为例进行了应用试验。

sentences.english: In china , both late marriages and late child-birth are advocated , in addition to fewer and better births .
sentences.chinese: 在中国，晚婚晚育和少生优生均受到提倡鼓励。

sentences.english: We should improve prenatal and ostnatal care and foster physical fitness among the population.
sentences.chinese: 我们要加强优生优育工作，通过人口素质。

sentences.english: In China, each couple is required to carry out a eugenic plan strictly.
sentences.chinese: 中国要求每对夫妇都要严格执行优生计划。

sentences.english: Methods Abnormal karyotype of chromosome in 123 males were undergone cytogenetic analysis.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解男性染色体异常核型对优生优育的影响。

sentences.english: In China today each couple is required to carry out a eugenic plan strictly.
sentences.chinese: 在今天的中国要求每对夫妇都要严格执行优生计划。

sentences.english: There, the Germans developed a eugenic society that apparently is limited to a specific number of people.
sentences.chinese: 在那里，德国制定了优生的社会，维持某特定的人数。

sentences.english: Eugenic policies were first implemented in the early 1900s in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 优生政策最先是在二十世纪初在美国开始实施。

sentences.english: For a while he also promoted eugenics.
sentences.chinese: 有一阵子，他还提倡优生学。

sentences.english: Not even the Heritage Foundationadvocates a return to such eugenicist policies.
sentences.chinese: 连传统基金会都不主张回到优生学政策。

definition: to enter the next grade school
